com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.write

Class DbfTableWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.write.FileTableWriter
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.write.DbfTableWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableWriter

    public class DbfTableWriter
extends FileTableWriter
    The DbfTableWriter class provides a TableWriter implementation for writing data tables to the dBase (dbf) format.
